title: Brie Bella meets her sister Nikki's boyfriend Artem Chigvintsev for lunch while filming Total Bellas
text:
Former WWE Diva Brie Bella was spotted hanging out with her sister Nikki Bella's boyfriend, Artem Chigvintsev while filming a reality series.

The 35 year old reality star was seen in Studio City, California while meeting the 37 year old Russian-born dancer at an outdoor cafe.

Artem's girlfriend Nikki was not spotted with the duo as they filmed a reality series, likely their E! series Total Bellas.

Brie and Artem: Former WWE Diva Brie Bella was spotted hanging out with her sister Nikki Bella's boyfriend, Artem Chigvintsev while filming a reality series

Bella was wearing a white low-cut top tucked into tight blue jeans, with a flannel shirt tied around her waist.

She was wearing a black hat as she gave her sister's boyfriend a hug as they met at the outdoor cafe.

She completed her look with a pair of red pumps, while carrying her phone to her meeting with Artem.

Brie's look: Bella was wearing a white low-cut top tucked into tight blue jeans, with a flannel shirt tied around her waist

Brie's look: She was wearing a black hat as she gave her sister's boyfriend a hug as they met at the outdoor cafe

Artem was wearing a flannel button-down shirt and light blue jeans that were rolled up over his ankles.

The dancer completed his look with a pair of white Yves Saint Laurent shoes as he met with Brie.

The pair were seen chatting with crew members between takes of their reality show shoot as well.

Crew: The pair were seen chatting with crew members between takes of their reality show shoot as well

Both of the Bella Sisters star on the E! reality series Total Bellas, a spin-off of the series Total Divas.

Both Brie and Nikki revealed on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon that Total Bellas was renewed for a fifth season.

Production is under way with the new season slated to premiere sometime in 2020, though an exact premiere date has not been released.

Reality stars: Both of the Bella Sisters star on the E! reality series Total Bellas, a spin-off of the series Total Divas

Renewed: Both Brie and Nikki revealed on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon that Total Bellas was renewed for a fifth season

Brie and her sister Nikki made their WWE debut as the Bella Twins in 2008, with their tenure lasting until 2012.

They wrestled on the independent circuit for the remainder of 2012 before returning to the WWE in March 2013.

Brie took a break from in-ring competition in 2016 and she announced her WWE retirement in March 2019.

WWE debut: Brie and her sister Nikki made their WWE debut as the Bella Twins in 2008, with their tenure lasting until 2012
description: Former WWE Diva Brie Bella was spotted hanging out with her sister Nikki Bella's boyfriend, Artem Chigvintsev while filming a reality series.
